mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ol.online_lecture_number) AS rn, ol.online_lecture_number, ol.title, ol.description, ol.lecture_url, ol.post_date, ol.views, i.name AS instructorName FROM online_lecture ol JOIN lecture l ON ol.lecture_number = l.lecture_number JOIN instructor i ON l.instructor_number = i.instructor_number WHERE ol.lecture_number = #{lectureNumber} ) t WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
